page.title: 12GREAT MEOLS:FAMILY LIFE.
page.content: {The"PARRY"Family.}A Typical Saturday. There are 5 people in our household, Mum,Dad,two brothers aged 9 and 6 years,and myself aged 10 years. We all wake up at about 7.30am to 8.00am and get up and get dressed at about 8.30am and have breakfast.My Dad has to go to work on alternate Saturdays as he is a doctor.He leaves home at about 8.45am to get to work at West Kirby Concourse which is about 3 miles away.His day consists of seeing patients in surgery and visiting them at home.He usually finishes at about midday. I clean out my hamster,she is nearly 2 years old and very tame. Her name is Quiver.Mum does the washing so we have clean clothes for school on Monday.On Saturdays my 9 year old brother goes to gymnastics at West Kirby Concourse from 11.00am to 1.30pm so we take him down by car.
